original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā āḷaviyam viharati aggāḷave cetiye

original: Tena kho pana samayena āḷavakā bhikkhū navakammaṁ karontā jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇampi mattikampi siñcantipi siñcāpentipi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āḷavakāḥ bhikkhū nava kammam karontāḥ jānam sappāṇakam udakam tiṇam pi mattikam pi siñcantipi siñcāpentipi

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āḷavakā bhikkhū jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇampi mattikampi siñcissantipi siñcāpessantipī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āḷavakāḥ bhikkhū jānam sappāṇakam udakam tiṇam pi mattikam pi siñcissanti pi siñcāpessanti pi iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āḷavake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āḷavake bhikkhū aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇampi mattikampi siñcathapi siñcāpethapī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave jānam sappāṇakam udakam tiṇam pi mattikam pi siñcathapi siñcāpethapi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇampi mattikampi siñcissathapi siñcāpessathapi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ jānam sappāṇakam udakam tiṇam pi mattikam pi siñcissatha pi
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇaṁ vā mattikaṁ vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam sappāṇakam udakam tiṇam vā mattikam vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: sāmaṁ vā jānāti. Aññe vā tassa ārocenti.
analyzed: sāmam vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti

original: Sakiṁ āṇatto bahukampi siñcati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: sakim āṇattaḥ bahukam pi siñcati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Sappāṇake sappāṇakasaññī tiṇaṁ vā mattikaṁ vā siñcati vā siñcāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: sappāṇake sappāṇaka saññī tiṇam vā mattikam vā siñcati vā vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Sappāṇake vematiko tiṇaṁ vā mattikaṁ vā siñcati vā siñcāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: sappāṇake vematikaḥ tiṇam vā mattikam vā siñcati vā vā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Sappāṇake appāṇakasaññī tiṇaṁ vā mattikaṁ vā siñcati vā siñcāpeti vā, anāpatti.
analyzed: sappāṇake appāṇaka saññī tiṇam vā mattikam vā siñcati vā vā anāpatti
